This is like saying "I'm hungry, please force someone with more money than me to buy me some food. Can I please just rob them?"

@PortlandCPUSA We are trying to get a tenant out in Chicago that has been squatting for almost two years.   City gave us $18,000 in back rent but for some reason, sent it directly to the tenant, who of course pocketed it.  She's now offering $6,000 as part of her willingness to move out.
@PortlandCPUSA There was a time I thought communism and a redistribution of wealth was the answer, I was also living in a tent and addicted to meth. I got clean and a job.
